title: Henry Rushbury
provenance_text:
Gerald Leslie Brockhurst [1890-1978], London, England and Sussex, England [1]. Charles Sessler, Philadelphia, PA; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1931.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in the "Twenty-ninth Annual International Exhibition of Paintings," Carnegie Institute, October-December 1930 (no. 170; illustrated, plate 106.)

creator.death_place: Franklin Lakes (Bergen county, New Jersey, United States)
